TopicTitle: Keybind Hackgrav to O key/ship specific Hackgrav?

Articles.Content:
When performing drop tests on craft or in manipulating ship placement I often need to quickly toggle Hackgrav quickly on and off, but the only way to do so is through the debug menu. This is for good reason as it is a cheat and would greatly confuse players, but for the more experienced crowd out there I'm betting that keybinding Hackgrav to the letter "O" key or a different key would be extremely useful. It sure would be useful for me .

I am not sure how possible it is with KSP's physics options, but it would equally be as useful if Hackgrav could be made ship specific, so other outlying craft wouldn't float away when testing one thing.

5 points of rep and a let into the group working on my current cinematic project for the one who makes it happen...

- Avera9eJoe
